head.title: Home - Floyd Municipal Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Instructional Support Application in MS Word
a.span: Instructional Support Application in MS Word

li.a: Instructional Support Application in MS Word

p.span: Breakfast and Lunch will be offered, free of charge, to all students of Floyd Schools and younger siblings, beginning March 16 - May 21. Meals will be served each day (Monday - Friday) between 9:00am and 10:30am at Portales High School and Lindsey-Steiner Elementary School.

span.style: color: rgb(0, 176, 80); font-family: "Times New Roman",serif; font-size: 18px;

p.span: Both breakfast and lunch will be served at the same time to expedite distribution of meals, but only one day’s meals will be served at a time. Meals will also be served at FLOYD SCHOOLS (Monday - Thursday) between 8:00am and 11:30am.

br.p:
The Floyd Municipal School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies.
Title IX Coordinator/504 Designee:
Superintendent-Damon Terry,
PO Box 65,
Floyd, NM 88118.
575-478-2211
